u.a: Gus and Leo move toward car , direct gaze , both standing still by car . Leo points to car and speaks .
Gus answers shaking head
Leo asks
Gus answers , nodding
both move off , referent is not clear
but Gus answers immediately .
Leo picks up telephone and looks at Gus , who answers second repetition . Gus looks around at floor while Leo dials phone .
Gus speaks softly
Leo glances around to answer and then continues with telephone .
telephone fell off stool .
Leo speaks into telephone . Leo looks at Gus for response of appreciation and smiles at gus
Leo speaks louder and with laugh . direct gaze .
still waiting for Gus to respond .
Gus responds . Leo puts down telephone and joins Gus on floor . common focus of attention is the toy car .
elicits gus
for the next 6 line(s): they are both close together on floor discussing different small cars and trucks . voices are calm and questioning is as much a game as a serious quest for information .
Leo looks around for a fire engine
moves off a little from Gus , talking to himself . Gus moves toward him and new toy , dunebuggy . Gus and Leo move new cars with car noises .
<9w> Gus picks up telephone on stool and as he does .
Leo speaks reserving phone for his own .
Gus replies and continues with phone while Leo still handles car . as Gus dials , Leo leaves car common focus of attention is the phone and stands by phone stool , watching gus
Leo smiles and as Gus puts down receiver
Leo picks it up and sits by stool , ready to dial , and Leo asks .
direct gaze as both lean over stool and Gus finally answers repeated questions . Leo starts dialing .
Gus continues to watch as Leo talks into phone .
<aft> Leo to a different car making engine noises . <aft> Gus returns to car on floor . <bef> Gus puts his imaginary phone to his ear .
Leo reaches for phone again and as he glances at and addresses gus
Gus turns from his toy car and answers glancing at leo
Leo begins to dial and Gus returns to his cars but looks again as Leo speaks . no answer to call .
Leo looks at gus
Leo glances at gus

Gus must have seen the other phone .
<bef> glances at Gus and waited until Gus had picked up his phone . then Leo goes on with his phone call . communication with phones is common focus of attention is the with occasional glances .
Leo leaves phone , goes to couch to get stuffed fish and returns to phone while Gus holds his phone and watches .
is part of phone communication .
Leo hangs up and returns fish to couch .
Gus hangs up too .
Leo goes to stove and glances at Gus first referent not clear .
Gus accepts suggestion happily . Gus gets up and goes to join Leo at stove .
Leo goes to get telephone
Gus glances at him . both are in front of stove , but Leo still holds receiver to ear while Gus is more interested in the oven .

finally Gus responds but is still most interested in oven .
both are parallelly interested in stove and working utensils but are not really involved in the conversation .
does not receive an answer and there is no direct gaze .
receives no clear response .
Leo speaks with increased enthusiasm and gets busier . Leo does most of the cooking action . Gus faces oven and is also involved but doesn't do much .
for the next 1 line(s): is an exchange . 'whoop' is an exclamation
for the next 7 line(s): conversation ensues Leo sits back from stove and addresses Gus with direct gaze .
as Gus speaks , Leo reaches for phone , takes it from car to floor and then puts it back on car to talk . Gus glances at him but returns his attention to pans on the stove .
Gus watches Leo a second then turns back to stove .
Leo gets up to go to stove and Gus follows him
<aft> Leo pushes buggy and Gus watches but is andin play' in the buggy . responding
again Gus responds although he is only standing beside Leo and buggy .
milk is stool . although this is a little loose , Gus seems to understand
Leo hands Gus stool . Leo pushes buggy with driving noises toward stove . then Leo sees broom , picks it up .
Gus watches Leo and as Leo sweeps
Gus responds . Gus pretend eats at stove while Leo sweeps broadly around room . no mutual attention for a few seconds . Leo drops broom and goes to ironing board .
attracts gus's attention only after repetition .
for the next 1 line(s): Gus then watches as Leo picks up ironing board and continues to watch leo
Gus touches board . common focus of attention is the ironing board . Leo attempts to take ironing board down and as he folds it down
<aft> Leo complies and attempts to put board back up . Gus warns him . Gus is very concerned throughout with leaving things alone .
at Gus comes closer , takes board and while Leo watches , fixes it . Leo is worried and sounds whining
Leo is pleased and puts iron back on it
Leo moves toward car .
Gus answers and stays by stove and board .

for the next 9 line(s): conversation about dinner begins . Leo puts phone on stool , moves it back to car . fairly direct gaze throughout . is announcement in louder voice . Leo gets stool and carries it to ironing board , back around car and to stove where Gus joins him . table for dinner is stool .
for the next 2 line(s): direct gaze . as Gus is interested in leo's intentions .
Leo starts to dial and Gus watches , then looks back at dishes
Leo has an idea and speaks more forcibly . <bef> Gus is looking at dishes until Leo addresses him now .
Gus responds a little abstractly , still busy with dishes and not really interested in leo's telephoning .
for the next 1 line(s): to phone . Gus misinterpreting his role , answers .
after a pause , Leo objects quickly

then Leo finishes with stove and moves toward Gus who watches only .

finally finding an objection , which doesn't materialize , Gus mumbles . can't see either child here .

Gus responds slowly .
Gus comes to leo

it falls off with a crash . Gus is distressed , Leo not so bothered . Gus directed repair work
